Create Roles and Locales for LDAP Group Map

Figure 3-10 Roles and Locales

To add/edit Roles and Locales follow the steps below:

 1. In the LDAP Group Map Configuration page, click Add/Edit Roles & Locales.

The LDAP Roles are displayed in the left pane, and LDAP Locales are displayed in the right pane.

 2. In the LDAP Roles page, enter a role name.

 3. From the Privileges drop-down list, select the required default role permission(s) that you wish to assign to users.

The total number of role selection are displayed in the Privileges field.

 4. Click Add to add the newly created role.

The role that is created is displayed under Role in the LDAP Group Map Configuration page.

 5. In the LDAP Locales page, enter a name for the locale.

 6. From the Organizations drop-down list, select the required organization(s) that you wish to assign to users.

The total number of locale selection are displayed in the Locales field.

 7. Click Add to add the newly created locale.

The locale that is created is displayed under Locale in the LDAP Group Map Configuration page.
